title: Which 3150?
body:
Which 3150 ip champ should I get? I'm sorta looking for strong, team fighter and can lane with ease... So which one?

I'm sorta looking for a jgler/mid, maybe even supp in some stages... 


(Also, don't care if they have a hard learning curve, I don't mind making the time...)

replies.body: corki is very good, i am saving up to get him aswell, corki can be laned in mid rn because of the tank meta

>corki can be laned in mid rn because of the tank meta

Any ADC can be laned mid, doesn't mean they are good in mid.

Not to mention, either your AP and built for a squishy burster with constant DPS, or your built AD for the tank meta (hint most of the mid corki's are AP)

Comments like this make me sad.

"I'm sorta looking for strong, team fighter and can lane with ease"
"I'm sorta looking for a jgler/mid, maybe even supp in some stages"

So you're SORTA looking for anything? 

Lo-el
Is Gragas ap build  strong though? I've only seen tanky ones...
It's strong if you know how to play him, it has been nerfed before, but it still can be extremely strong, tankier does tend to be better because of his passive however.
Blitzcrank can do it all for 3150 :)

>strong, team fighter and can lane with ease

This is not something that explains blitzcrank at all.

Also your level 27 don't think you know everything about the game.

Gragas is the only one that actually covers everything you ask for.

Reason's you would buy the others;
Anivia: Strong mid laner high single target burst potential and a lot of AoE CC.
Olaf: Decent Top/Jungler that is great at diving backlines with an ult that stops CC working.

Gragas.

Gragas can go AP or Tank and is an ok Supp. Like a shtty version of Leona.
